document.full_text: queen elizabeth offered her sympathy and regret on wednesday to all those who had suffered from centuries of conflict between britain and ireland in a powerful and personal address to the irish nation.
document.title: britain's queen offers sympathy, regret to ireland
lines_and_colors: queen elizabeth offered her sympathy and regret on wednesday to all those who had suffered from centuries of conflict between britain and ireland in a powerful and personal address to the irish nation.
